mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectCsoCnsltDetailJobTp Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ CNSLT_SN , CNSLT_DETAIL_TURN , CNSLT_JOB_TP_CD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM CSO_CNSLT_DETAIL_JOB_TP WHERE 1 = 1 AND CNSLT_SN = #{cnsltSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND CNSLT_DETAIL_TURN = #{cnsltDetailTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND CNSLT_JOB_TP_CD = #{cnsltJobTpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
